entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
